00027 void init_range_server_options() {
00028   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00029     ("log-broker", str(), "Use the specified DFS broker (in <host>:<port> "
00030         "format for commit log)")
00031     ("crash-test", str(), "Arguments for crash simulation")
00032     ;
00033     alias("port", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port");
00034     alias("log-host", "Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Host");
00035     alias("log-port", "Hypertable.RangeServer.CommitLog.DfsBroker.Port");
00036     alias("reactors", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Reactors");
00037     alias("workers", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Workers");
00038 }
00039 
00040 void init_range_server() {
00041   String logbroker = get("log-broker", String());
00042 
00043   if (logbroker.length()) {
00044     Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(logbroker);
00045 
00046     if (!e.port)
00047       HT_THROWF(Error::CONFIG_BAD_ARGUMENT, "expected <host>:<port> format for "
00048           "log-broker, got '%s'", logbroker.c_str());
00049 
00050     properties->set("log-host", e.host);
00051     properties->set("log-port", e.port);
00052   }
00053 }
00054 
00055 }} // namespace Hypertable::Config
